Hoboken.Kest\u00e9:
Kesté Pizza & Vino, also known as Kesté Pizzeria or simply Keste's, is a pizzeria, located in Manhattan, that serves Neapolitan-style wood-fired brick oven pizza. As of 2015, it is the fourth-highest rated pizzeria in the United States on TripAdvisor.


== History ==
Kesté's was founded in 2009 by Roberto Caporuscio, who works alongside his daughter, Giorgia.
